meanings.definition: A record of events written by a person having intimate knowledge of them and based on personal observation.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading her grandmother's memoirs about growing up during the war.
meanings.sent2: I decided to write my memoirs to share my life story with others.
meanings.sent3: His memoirs were so detailed, it felt like he had a camera in his brain!
meanings.sent4: Her memoirs were a window into a world I had never experienced.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions in his memoirs made me feel like I was living in that era.

meanings.definition: An account of one's personal life and experiences.
meanings.sent1: Reading her father's memoirs helped her understand his past better.
meanings.sent2: She decided to publish her memoirs to inspire others with her journey.
meanings.sent3: His memoirs were so entertaining, it was like reading a thrilling novel!
meanings.sent4: Her memoirs painted a picture of a life full of adventures and challenges.
meanings.sent5: The emotional depth in his memoirs touched the hearts of all who read them.
